content.content: Does anyone have use-case for the block parameter in eth_estimateGas? I just stumbled over an ancient (2016) bug https://github.com/ethereum/go-ethereum/issues/2586 and not sure yet if it should be changed in the documentation/spec or in geth. But I think we should do something about it to remove this stumbling block. Also as @karalabe just pointed out - the documentation is also inconsistent in this regard - this section does not mention estimateGas:    GitHub    ethereum/wiki The Ethereum Wiki. Contribute to ethereum/wiki development by creating an account on GitHub.
